import React from 'react' import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const TourCard = ({ tour }) => { const { id, title, city, photo, price, features, avgRating, reviews } = tour return (
Featured
{city} {avgRating}{' '} {reviews.length}
{title}
${price} /per person
) } export default TourCard
